ComicInfo.Summary:
"I REMEMBER WHEN SHE LOVED ME." KIRKMAN & AZACETA's horror epic continues. Details of Kyle's life, in the time before he returned to Rome, West Virginia, are revealed...as the danger from all around him intensifies.
